description: You are given $ n $ segments on a line. There are no ends of some segments that coincide. For each segment find the number of segments it contains.
inputFormat:
The first line contains a single integer $ n $ ( $ 1<=n<=2·10^{5} $ ) — the number of segments on a line.

Each of the next $ n $ lines contains two integers $ l_{i} $ and $ r_{i} $ ( $ -10^{9}<=l_{i}<r_{i}<=10^{9} $ ) — the coordinates of the left and the right ends of the $ i $ -th segment. It is guaranteed that there are no ends of some segments that coincide.
outputFormat: Print $ n $ lines. The $ j $ -th of them should contain the only integer $ a_{j} $ — the number of segments contained in the $ j $ -th segment.
translation: 在一条直线上有$n$条线段，每条线段用$(l,r)$表示，求每条线段包含多少条其他的线段。
